item.title: CTCNet: Our Journey
item.description: CTCNet has had a fantastic journey over the past years, starting as a small coalition of six technology access programs on the East Coast and developing into a national network of more than 1200 community technology centers. Throughout this period...

item.title: Rep. Nydia Velázquez--Congressional Support for Community Technology
